Repack Features

  • Based on Roxy.Raccoon-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-roxy.raccoon.iso (661,422,080 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Smaller archive size (compressed from 631 to 415 MB)
  • Installation takes one minute
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 2.4 GB
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

When a self-centered, egotistical witch spreads her dark magic across the land, it is up to one raccoon to stop her! Play as Roxy, an adventurous young cub as she leaps, climbs, and rolls through four unique worlds in order to end the witch’s evil plan!

Roxy Raccoon is a cute, fun-filled 3D platformer for all ages and a throw back to collectathons of the past. Help your raccoon friends as they put an end to the witch’s wicked schemes and conquer her many challenges. Freely explore four uniquely themed worlds as you delve deeper into the witch’s territory and steal her treasure!

Game Features

  • Compete in the witch’s trials and beat her at her own games, including popular sports, board games, pinball, races and almost anything that requires competition!
  • Explore 4 Unique worlds and Experience an ever-expanding Hub-World as you unlock new areas!
  • Sneak past enemies as you traverse through the witch’s territory, bypass her minions, and steal her treasure!
  • Catch the Witch’s Pesky Pet Rabbits!
  • Help your friends along your journey and make news ones along the way!
  • Adventure in style as you unlock colorful new cosmetics to customize Roxy’s appearance.
